scripts.test:tmp: NODE_PATH=packages/medium-draft/src babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --require babel-core/register --require test-js/css-null-compiler.js --require ./test-js/test_helper.js $(find packages/medium-draft/src -path '*.spec.js')
scripts.test:unit: NODE_PATH=packages/medium-draft/src babel-node ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --require babel-core/register --require test-js/css-null-compiler.js --require ./test-js/test_helper.js $(find packages/medium-draft/src -path '*.spec.js')
scripts.test: yarn run test:lint && yarn run test:unit
